mapper.select: SELECT cover ,trip_name ,target_id FROM travel_temp_colleague.t_target_img WHERE cover like "%hunansheng%" OR cover like "%beijing%";

SELECT t1.target_id ,t1.name ,t1.`desc` ,t2.name AS province_name ,(CASE WHEN t3.name IS NULL THEN t2.name ELSE t3.name END ) AS city_name FROM (SELECT target_id ,NAME ,`desc` ,(CASE WHEN `type` = '-1' THEN target_id ELSE SUBSTRING(relational, 7, 6) END ) AS province_id ,(CASE WHEN `type` = '-1' THEN target_id WHEN `type` = '0' OR LENGTH(relational) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING(relational, 7, 6) ELSE SUBSTRING(relational, 13, 6) END ) AS city_id FROM travel_temp_colleague.t_target ) AS t1 right JOIN (SELECT target_id ,NAME FROM travel_temp_colleague.t_target WHERE `type` IN ('-1', '0', '1') and (NAME = "湖南" or NAME = "北京") ) AS t2 ON t1.province_id = t2.target_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT target_id ,NAME FROM travel_temp_colleague.t_target WHERE `type` IN ('-1', '0', '1') ) AS t3 ON t1.city_id = t3.target_id
